Name: polyemisokos
About the game: An abstract puzzle game about connections. Features: -Over 100 Sokoban-style puzzles in a linear sequence -Extraordinarily simple mechanics which construct an atypically intense complexity -Support for colorblind & high-contrast color modes -Many more secret things!
